message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your enthusiasm.  I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.  Let's see if we can find common ground here!

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation, I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my original proposal. I am willing to offer $1,400,000 for the product. I hope this suggestion will lead us to a satisfactory outcome.
